text: the header lives in our headless cms. When a change is made to the header and deployed the source code API is triggered to update the file in Design Manager.

a couple of things that had to be added.  All relative href's in the file are updated to absolute URL's in the build step.  All src attributes are wrapped with get_asset_url hubl function with assets also being uploaded to a common folder.
```{{ get_asset_url("assets/file.png") }} ```
